name: Vegan Leather Clutch Black Pleated Zippered
description:
Vegan Leather Clutch Black Pleated Zippered.This leather clutch with a pleated front in black is the right choice for all veg & vegans.The clutch closes with a recessed zipper,very professional.
The zippered vegan clutch is very carefully stitched with reinforced seams and along with the durable material, this will be your favorite clutch!

The clutch has a beautiful sun ray pleated design in the front.The pleats on top are not regular pleats,if you notice they are overlapping in layers,fanning out like rays of sun,its made with lot of precision & technique.

The fabric is faux leather with a beautiful grain,the quality is extremely good.

The clutch is fully lined in cotton in limestone.

Just right for the upcoming holiday parties ,weddings & evenings out!

Also available in 

Brown
Tangerine
Ice Blue
Plaid
Fiery Red

*********************************************************************************************************

The dimensions are

11.5"(29.5cm) wide at the bottom
11"(28.5cm) wide at the top
6.5"(17cm) high

This is a MADE TO ORDER bag ,& it ships 2 days after the payment is cleared

All my purses are made with complete attention to detail and have high quality of craftsmanship.They are 100% handmade by me in my home.

name: pdf pattern -zippered coin purse in 2 sizes semi circular & ruffled
description:
pdf pattern for zippered coin purse in 2 sizes with a semi circular ruffled shape.The coin purse has a wide gusseted base giving lot of storage space.

You will acquire skills to
* add a zipper
* sewing curves

Finished Dimensions for medium size are
6.8"(18cm) wide x 4.8"(12.5cm) high x 4"(10.5cm) broad base

Finished dimensions for Small size are
6"(15.5 cm)wide x 4.5"(12 cm) high x 2.9"(7.5cm) broad base


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You can make this coin purse in faux leather,real leather,vinyl,canvas or lighter weight fabrics with the help of fusible interfacing. The pattern has instructions for both .

Within 24 hrs of ordering you will receive:

-1 pdf file with 8 pages of clear step-by-step instructions with color photographs that even beginners can easily follow.
-Full size pattern pieces for medium & small size .
-My support at all times ,you can contact me any time to clarify any doubts or questions.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Because of the nature of this item,I cannot cancel the sale once I have sent the pattern & there is no refund .Thank you for understanding.

You are welcome to hand make items from this pattern for commercial and non-commercial use by crediting or linking to my  shop .
I respectfully ask you to not claim my original pattern designs as your own creation.

Please note you are purchasing the instructions, not the finished item.

name: pdf tutorial Pleated Wristlet Clutch with Zip Top Closure
description:
Design your own pleated zippered wristlet with the help of my easy to follow e-pattern.The pdf comes with clear & easy to follow instructions with lots of color photographs.

The corners have gussets which give this wristlet a boxy & spacey shape.The strap attached to the zip tab add a sassy element to this wristlet/clutch along with ease of holding it.

It has a zip top closure ,very professional.If you are scared of trying zippers,now is the time to take the plunge.I have explained adding the zipper in a super easy way!Even beginners can add zippers with this:)

The clutch is fully lined & has an internal pocket for added utility.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Finished Dimensions are

5" tall x 8.5" wide at bottom x 7"wide at top x 3" broad at the base.

The wristlet strap is 6" and attached to the zip tab. The interior pocket is 5" by 4".


You can make this wristlet/clutch in faux leather,real leather,vinyl,canvas or lighter weight fabrics with the help of fusible interfacing. The pattern has instructions for both with suggestions for which interfacing to use.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Within 24 hrs of ordering you will receive:

-1 pdf file with 9 pages of clear step-by-step instructions with more than 20 color photographs that even beginners can easily follow.
-My support at all times ,you can contact me any time to clarify any doubts or questions.

Because of the nature of this item,I cannot cancel the sale once I have sent the pattern & there is no refund .Thank you for understanding.

You are welcome to hand make items from this pattern for commercial and non-commercial use to sell by crediting or linking to my shop -
I respectfully ask you to not claim my original pattern designs as your own creation.

name: trifold wallet with check book cover pdf tutorial
description:
pdf tutorial to make your own trifold wallet with check book cover,credit card slots,bills slot & 2 pen slips.

The finshed wallet comes with easily accessible panels, pockets, pen holders, snap closure & a stylish flap cover. The detailing & the look give you great designer style without the designer price tag!

7.5” (19.5cm) wide x 5.5” (14.5cm) high when closed & 17” (43.5cm) long when fully opened including the flap

name: Pleated Clutch bag with Wood Handles-pdf tutorial
description:
pdf tutorial for  Pleated Clutch bag with Wood Handles.Design your own clutch with the help of my easy to follow e-pattern.The pdf comes with instructions & pattern pieces for 3 type of pleats in 2 sizes!

The pattern has instructions on
* adding rivets
* adding magnetic snaps
* tips on sewing with leather.

It closes with 2 magnetic snaps.The clutch is fully lined & has an internal pocket for added utility.

The corners have teeny tiny pleats to provide a gusset as well as to give shape to the clutch.The wooden handles add a sassy element to this clutch along with ease of holding it.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You will acquire skills to
* add a magnetic snap
* pleating & sewing curves
* adding rivets.

Finished Dimensions for regular size are
7.5" tall x 14" wide at bottom x 9"wide at top x 3" broad base.

Finished dimensions for mini size are 6" tall by 11.5" wide at the bottom by 8" wide at the top by 2.5" broad base.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You can make this clutch in faux leather,real leather,vinyl,canvas or lighter weight fabrics with the help of fusible interfacing. The pattern has instructions for both with suggestions for which interfacing to use.

Within 24 hrs of ordering you will receive:

-1 pdf file with 13 pages of clear step-by-step instructions with 30 color photographs that even beginners can easily follow.
-Full size pattern pieces for regular & mini size for 3 type of pleats.
-My support at all times ,you can contact me any time to clarify any doubts or questions.
